title: Teaching your wings to fly (TEFC)
creator_credit: Lawren Productions, Anne Lief Barlin and Yasha Aginsky
brief_description: Dance instructor Anne Lief Barlin demonstrates how to teach young children 19 movement activities designed to enhance body control, self-esteem, spatial awareness, coordination, relation to others, and relaxation.
